title: Increase labor, decrease capital with given data

content.description: At its current employment level of labor and capital, a firm observes the following.
content.question: Marginal product of labor = 30 units Marginal product of capital = 60 units Price of labor = $3 per unit Price of capital = $15 per unit Which of the following actions should the firm take in order to achieve the least-cost combination of labor and capital and produce the same level of output?

choices.label: Labor Capital No change No change

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets
